Matam is a non profit app developed to honor the greatest sacrifice of Imam Hussain (A.s) and to spread the message of Imam Hussain (A.s) and the message of karbala through Noha.

As we are surrounding our self with more and more technological advancements, at the same time we must not forget about the sacrifice presented by Imam Hussain (A.s) for Humanity, and keeping the same in view, we at \'Re-Imagin Technology\' ventured out to create this app, which, while utilizing the tools of technology, is providing the user with experience of knowing about Karbala, and Imam Hussain (A.s) and 72 Shoda-e-Karbala.

Our goal behind creating this app is to present a meaningful narrative of the events of Karbala, as happened 1400 years ago. As we found out there is no better way to present the narrative than using \'Kalam\' of \'Shora-e-Ahl-e-baite\' and soulful voices of Nauha-khuwan Hazrat, such as Janab Nadeem Sarwar, Janab Irfan Haider and many more.
